update flight_picking
TIME = #{TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
ROOM_NUMBER = #{ROOM_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GUEST_NAME = #{GUEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

OCCUR_TIME = #{OCCUR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMPORT_TIME = #{IMPORT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDIT_TIME = #{EDIT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flight_picking set TIME = #{TIME,jdbcType=DATE}, ROOM_NUMBER = #{ROOM_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUEST_NAME = #{GUEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLIGHT_NUMBER = #{FLIGHT_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_NUMBER = #{PLATE_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICKER_NAME = #{PICKER_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICKER_TELE = #{PICKER_TELE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{CONTACT_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_TELE = #{CONTACT_TELE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OCCUR_TIME = #{OCCUR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMPORT_TIME = #{IMPORT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDIT_TIME = #{EDIT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from flight_picking where ROOM_NUMBER like CONCAT('%', #{ROOM_NUMBER}, '%')
and TIME >= #{START_TIME} and TIME <= #{END_TIME}

select * from flight_picking where ROOM_NUMBER like CONCAT('%', #{ROOM_NUMBER}, '%')
and TIME >= #{START_TIME} and TIME <= #{END_TIME}
